articles.description: Allentown Morning Call Solutions to Pennsylvania's opioid epidemic: A county-by-county look Allentown Morning Call Pennsylvania newsrooms have been documenting the opioid crisis for many years. But now, in a special project, “State of Emergency: Searching for…
